title: Reconnect Bug, No idea what to do.
body:
Pretty much what the title says, everytime when I want to play a game the game bugged out after the selcetion screen is done resulting in a screen with "reconnect" after pressing the button over 3 games a total of 250 times I'm pretty safe to say that it doesn't work.

As a new player to this game I have no clue what to do by this or if I even get this marked as "AFK/leaver" and I already made 2 bug reports in 1 hour with one asking to remove the possible mark. 

But my question is, does anyone know how to fix this anoying bug what prevents me from playing the game? (Not sure if this is important but I'm playing version v7.24, Could be a outdated one since I saw a higher number but I might be wrong but if so I also got no update for the newest version.) This bug is active on me since today 2-1-2018 with the first game I tried to play of today.

replies.body:
Hey there, a little late with this response but I wanted to check in and see if you were still experiencing the trouble connecting to game like this. Bladenite had a good idea gather info and sending it to Tech Support to give it a look see. If it's still bothering you, I do have some suggestions you can try as well while we're here.

First, you can try to manually forward any potentially closed ports on your router that LoL needs by following [**the steps here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq8). I'd also suggest making sure your firewall isn't blocking LoL from connecting as well; on the same page you can find steps to bypass it if necessary [**right here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3).

Run a Custom Game or 3 to test out the changes and let me know if you can consistently connect to the game afterwards. :)

Howdy Darth Popé,

Although bugs isn't really my area of expertise, I'll try to help you out.
First off, I suggest you download the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).
After the download is complete, you'll want to run the HRT.

if you’re still seeing issues after deploying this pint-sized problem-solver, it can automagically gather your system information and LoL logs into a .zip folder . Then send a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with this information:

-Brief description of the problem you're running into
-Solutions you tried with the Hextech Repair Tool
-Attach the .zip folder created by the tool (if you're on a Mac, you can learn how to grab your logs [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#section-mac))

I hope this helps you out with your Reconnect Problem.

Sincerely
-Bladenite
